get.summary: Simulates the executions of rules filtered by tag 'Schedule' within the given times.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Start time of the simulated rule executions. Will default to the current time. [yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSZ]

parameters.name: until
parameters.description: End time of the simulated rule executions. Will default to 30 days after the start time. Must be less than 180 days after the given start time. [yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSZ]

400.description: The max. simulation duration of 180 days is exceeded.

get.summary: Gets a template corresponding to the given UID.

404.description: Template corresponding to the given UID does not found.

get.summary: Get the default sink if defined or the first available sink.
Get the default source if defined or the first available source.

Get the list of all sources.

post.summary: Delete the session associated with a refresh token.

404.description: User or refresh token not found

get.summary: List the API tokens associated to the authenticated user.

post.summary: Get access and refresh tokens.

delete.summary: Revoke a specified API token associated to the authenticated user.

post.summary: Installs the add-on with the given ID.

500.description: Configuration can not be read due to internal error

parameters.description: filter UIDs by prefix (multiple comma-separated prefixes allowed, for example: 'system,mqtt')

200.description: Channel type with provided channelTypeUID does not exist.

404.description: Given channel type UID not found.

delete.summary: Removes the discovery result from the inbox.

404.description: Item not found or name in path invalid.

requestBody.description: valid item command (e.g. ON, OFF, UP, DOWN, REFRESH)

delete.summary: Removes an item from the registry.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: limit output to the given fields (comma separated)

404.description: Content does not match the path

put.summary: Links an item to a channel.

delete.summary: Unlinks an item from a channel.

get.summary: Gets item persistence data from the persistence service.

parameters.name: serviceId
parameters.description: Id of the persistence service. If not provided the default service will be used

parameters.name: starttime
parameters.description: Start time of the data to return. Will default to 1 day before endtime. [yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSZ]

parameters.name: endtime
parameters.description: End time of the data to return. Will default to current time. [yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSZ]

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number of data to return. This parameter will enable paging.

parameters.name: boundary
parameters.description: Gets one value before and after the requested period.

put.summary: Stores item persistence data into the persistence service.

parameters.name: serviceId
parameters.description: Id of the persistence service. If not provided the default service will be used

parameters.name: time
parameters.description: Time of the data to be stored. Will default to current time. [yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSZ]

delete.summary: Delete item data from a specific persistence service.

parameters.name: starttime
parameters.description: Start time of the data to return. [yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSZ]

parameters.name: endtime
parameters.description: End time of the data to return. [yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSZ]

get.summary: Gets a list of items available via a specific persistence service.

parameters.name: serviceId
parameters.description: Id of the persistence service. If not provided the default service will be used

get.summary: Gets a list of persistence services.
